com.stabilit.scm.common.net.req
Interface IConnection

All Superinterfaces:
ICommunicationPoint, IFactoryable
All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyHttpConnection, NettyTcpConnection, NioHttpConnection, NioTcpConnection
public interface IConnection
extends ICommunicationPoint

The Interface IConnection abstracts any connection to a responder.

Author:
JTraber
